de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics

Class VectorGameCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.bitbrain.braingdx.graphics.VectorGameCamera
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GameCamera, Resizeable

    public class VectorGameCamera
extends Object
implements GameCamera
    Using underlying vectors to calculate the camera tracking.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Miguel Gonzalez Sanchez
